text: Charles Gald Sibley (August 7, 1917 â€“ April 12, 1998) was an American ornithologist and molecular biologist. He had a big influence on the scientific classification of birds. Sibley's taxonomy was a major influence on many organizations, such as the American Ornithologists' Union. title: Charles Sibley
